ej,ozard801,M,monte901,Warning to pitcher $the first pitch to Dave Concepcion was a knockdown; Larry Christenson was warned; Phillies Manager Danny Ozark ejected by HP umpire Ed Montague

ej,tavef101,P,sudoe901,Call at HP ej,huttt101,P,sudoe901,Non-call of home run Frank Taveras ejected by HP umpire Ed Sudol $the Phillies thought Richie Hebner had hit a game-ending home run and trotted around the bases; 1B umpire Dick Stello ruled that the ball had hit the top of the fence and caromed back onto the field and was in play; the Pirates relayed the ball to HP; it arrived just as Mike Schmidt collided with catcher Ed Ott and touched the plate; the Phillies charged Stello claiming that the hit was a home run; the Pirates stormed HP umpire Ed Sudol claiming that Schmidt did not touch the plate; Frank Taveras ejected by Sudol; also Hutton of Phillies (not in game) ejected by HP umpire Stello for arguing Hebner's ball was a home run
$umpire Ed Sudol ordered to sit out this game by NL President Chub Feeney due to argument near the end of the previous game
